Package com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core

Sprouts top-level package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Move
    A Sprouts Move consists of one or more Submoves.
    Submove
    Represents a part of the player's move drawn on the screen.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CobwebSwitch
    A mutable cobweb switch.
    MainScreen
    The main screen of the application with the toolbar and the game board.
    RenderedMove
    A RenderedMove renders the move by rendering all of its Submoves.
    RenderedSubmove
    Represents a Submove drawn on the screen.
    Sprouts
    Sprouts main application class.
    SubmoveElement
    A SubmoveElement is a Submove in a sequence of Submoves that comprise a Move.
    SubmoveHead
    A SubmoveHead can be viewed as the head element in a linked list of Submoves that comprise a Move.
    SubmoveSequence
    An implementation of the Move interface as a sequence of Submoves.

Package com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core Description

Sprouts top-level package.
